channel.title: Selling Grand Exchange and Saving
channel.description:
[B]Hello guys i am having a problem, i have Grand exchange into my server and when you buy an item you have to wait for someone to sell it for it to work. Here is what my selling says. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y4wQswg.png[/img] I have tried a lot of items in game and i just ran out of idea. I really need help thanks.
I have another problem to, when you logout or restart the server the item you bought is gone in Grand Exchange and it takes the cash. Anyone have an answer for that?
Thank you guys sooo much! Thanks, cya :D[/B]

item.title: Selling Grand Exchange and Saving
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Goto you grand exchange method and add c.saveGame();

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Grand Exchange and Saving
item.dc:creator: @mattadog18 mattadog18
item.description:
@mattadog18 wrote:

Fixed selling now i need it to save

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Grand Exchange and Saving
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

[quote=“mattadog18, post:3, topic:540329”]I found where it says that this is what it says.

if (interfaceId == 105) {
player.grandExchange().handle(componentId, packetId);
} else if (interfaceId == 107) {
if (!ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(slotId2).isTradeable())
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“You can’t offer this item!”);
else
player.grandExchange().offer(slotId2);
}[/quote]

srs? it sais your trying to sell a non tradeable item

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Grand Exchange and Saving
item.dc:creator: @mattadog18 mattadog18
item.description:
@mattadog18 wrote:

I found where it says that this is what it says.

if (interfaceId == 105) {
player.grandExchange().handle(componentId, packetId);
} else if (interfaceId == 107) {
if (!ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(slotId2).isTradeable())
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“You can’t offer this item!”);
else
player.grandExchange().offer(slotId2);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Selling Grand Exchange and Saving
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Search your server to see when that text is thrown, as for your second save GE items to a central file or just remove them and save them in the player file once they log out.

Read full topic
